alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Putnam; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 12:13PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Putnam, southeastern Whiteside, northeastern Henry and Bureau Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hooppole, or 19 miles south of Morrison, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheffield, Wyanet, Princeton, DePue and Tiskilwa. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 39 and 72. Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
